attributes.additional_details: To ban umbrella and payroll companys who rip us offf with the way we on zero hour contract pay two lots of N.I employees and employers no holiday pay unlees its your own money they stop off you no sik pay its is a big con for all agency workers
attributes.background: To ban umbrella and payroll companys who  are robbing the working man .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about certain employment arrangements, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what type of businesses you would like to be prevented from operating.
